short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Site Blocker protects you from malicious websites by cross-referencing Anysur's Evil Database. Browse with confidence.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you prevent going on malicious websites. It's connected with the anysur database which is updated by its active community and services related to detecting malicious content.
